rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0669, 1250, 1251, 1752, M6006}

unitName: Mental health nursing concepts and practice
description: The nature of mental illness; the nursing process in mental health nursing; roles and functions of mental health nurses; context of care; mental health problems and disorders; therapeutic interventions in mental health care; ethical and legal issues; specialisation in mental health nursing.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
